job.title: Software Engineer, Data
job.description: Tinder brings people together With tens of millions of users hundreds of millions of downloads 2 billion swipes per day hundreds of thousands of requests per second 20 million matches per day and a presence in every country on earth our reach is expansiveand rapidly growingltbrgtltbrgtTinder is looking for an engineer whos eager to design and implement the next generation of our data platform Our growing business always has new needs for actionable information and this gives us an exciting roadmap with highvalue products ready to be designed and many more waiting to be identified This role will involve working with large scale data pipelines in nearrealtime batch and lambda frameworksltbrgtltbrgtThis role can also be located in Los Angeles CA or Palo Alto CAltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltstronggtltligtWork on pipelines ingesting greater than 1gb per secondltligtltligtDesign implement and own software solutions for ingesting and exposing high volume data feedsltligtltligtCoordinate with engineering analytics and other teams to assess the cost and value of existing and potential projectsltligtltligtResearch and evaluate new technologies in the big data space to guide our continuous improvementltligtltligtCollaborate with multifunctional engineers across the company to help tune the performance of large data applications to drive cost savingsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtWere looking forltbrgtltstronggtltligt3 years of experience working with a distributed framework like Spark Flink Kafka Streams Dask or Hadoopltligtltligt1 years of experience with ETL job orchestration preferably with a featurerich tool such as Airflow Argo or Rundeckltligtltligt2 years of experience working with Scala Python Java or Cltligtltligt2 years ensuring the reliability of software and the integrity of large data stores in a production environmentltligtltligtExposure to a variety of databases and noSQL appliances Redshift Snowflake Druid Dynamo Cassandra Kafka Elastic Search Hive etcltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtAs part of our team youll enjoyltbrgtltstronggtltligt Working on a product that has an immediate impact on peoples lives all around the worldltligtltligt Collaborating with a team of creative fun and driven colleaguesltligtltligt Comprehensive health coverage competitive salary 401k employer match Employee Stock Purchase Plan ESPPltligtltligt Other perks and wellness benefits like a fitness membership subsidy paid concierge medical membership pet insurance offerings and a commuter subsidyltligtltligt A robust Learning  Development offering including our MentorMatch program access to a library of 6000 online learning courses through Udemy and an annual LD stipendltligtltligt Access to mental health resourcesltligtltligt Fertility preservation benefitsltligtltligt No Meeting Wednesdays and access to a wide range of product and service discounts through Perkspotltligtltligt Charitable donations match up to 15000 annuallyltligtltligt Monthly and weekly interactive virtual events including Book Club trivia with prizes and yoga workoutsltligtltligt The opportunity to join six active Employee Resource Groups ERGsltbrgtltbrgtltligtAt Tinder we dont just accept difference  we celebrate it we support it and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees our product and our community We strive to make our workplace an inclusive and diverse environment giving people from all walks of life the opportunity to have a voice We champion and encourage those who bring different perspectives ideas and creativity to join our team dedicated to bringing people together across the globe Tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome all people regardless of sex gender identity race ethnicity disability or other lived experience
